Books.Title: The Moon is Down
Books.Dedication Text: TO PAT COVICI A GREAT EDITOR AND A GREAT FRIEND

Books.Title: Veterinary Guide for Farmers
Books.Dedication Text: Dedicated to the GI Joes who, having fought for our nation, will now help to feed and clothe it better as a result of their "on the farm" training under the auspices of the Veterans Farm Training program of the United States Veterans Administration and Vocational Education leaders of the various states
